summary: Mowcat Studio - Mowcat is your quintessential black cat, a shadow with whiskers and a penchant for goofing off. This furry rascal was born to dilly dally, destined to spend his days lounging in sunbeams, chasing invisible mice, and getting his head stuck in random objects around the house. If there were a laziness Olympics, Mowcat would take home the gold without lifting a paw.
